objects.name: Man in the Browser Mitigation
objects.description:
Since browser pivoting requires a high integrity process to launch from, restricting user permissions and addressing Privilege Escalation and Bypass User Account Control Mitigation opportunities can limit the exposure to this technique. 

Close all browser sessions regularly and when they are no longer needed.
objects.x_mitre_detection:
Since browser pivoting requires a high integrity process to launch from, restricting user permissions and addressing Privilege Escalation and {{LinkById|T1088}} opportunities can limit the exposure to this technique. 

Close all browser sessions regularly and when they are no longer needed.
